import { TableHead } from '@looker/components'
import { Meta } from '@storybook/addon-docs'
import storyBasic from '!!raw-loader!./Basic'
import { excludedProps } from '@looker/storybook'

<Meta component={TableHead} title="Docs/TableHead" />

# TableHead

This component is used to define the heading of the table and describes the rows of data below. The `<TableHeader>` should have one `<TableRow>` tag and then use the `<TableHeaderCell>` tags to be semantically correct.

<Editor code={storyBasic} />

<ArgsTable of={TableHead} exclude={excludedProps} />
